Package ohos.agp.components

Class ComponentTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentTransition

  • public class ComponentTransition
extends Object
    Provides an animation for the layout change of a ComponentContainer object.

    To perform layout transition on a layout container, create a ComponentTransition object, and then set a ComponentContainer object using ComponentContainer#setComponentTransition.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int CHANGING
      Indicates the animation running on components changed by layout modification, instead of by adding or removing a component to or from the layout container.
      static int OTHERS_GONE
      Indicates the animation running on components that are changed because one of their associated components disappears from the ComponentContainer.
      static int OTHERS_SHOW
      Indicates the animation running on components that are changed because one of their associated components appears in the ComponentContainer.
      static int SELF_GONE
      Indicates the animation running on a component when it disappears from the ComponentContainer.
      static int SELF_SHOW
      Indicates the animation running on a component when it appears in the ComponentContainer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ComponentTransition​()
      Default constructor used to create a ComponentTransition instance.

    • Field Detail

      • CHANGING

        public static final int CHANGING
        Indicates the animation running on components changed by layout modification, instead of by adding or removing a component to or from the layout container.

        By default, this transition type is disabled. You can invoke addTransitionType(int) to enable it.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OTHERS_GONE

        public static final int OTHERS_GONE
        Indicates the animation running on components that are changed because one of their associated components disappears from the ComponentContainer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OTHERS_SHOW

        public static final int OTHERS_SHOW
        Indicates the animation running on components that are changed because one of their associated components appears in the ComponentContainer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SELF_GONE

        public static final int SELF_GONE
        Indicates the animation running on a component when it disappears from the ComponentContainer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SELF_SHOW

        public static final int SELF_SHOW
        Indicates the animation running on a component when it appears in the ComponentContainer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ComponentTransition

        public ComponentTransition​()
        Default constructor used to create a ComponentTransition instance.
        Since:

    • Method Detail

      • release

        public void release​()
        Releases a ComponentTransition object.
        Since:
        4

      • addTransitionType

        public void addTransitionType​(int type)
        Enables a transition type for a ComponentTransition object.

        Transition types include SELF_SHOW, OTHERS_SHOW, OTHERS_GONE, SELF_GONE, and CHANGING.

        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the transition type to enable.
        Since:
        4

      • removeTransitionType

        public void removeTransitionType​(int type)
        Removes a transition type from a ComponentTransition object.

        By default, all transition types except CHANGING are enabled.

        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the transition type to remove.
        Since:
        4

      • hasTransitionType

        public boolean hasTransitionType​(int type)
        Checks whether a specified transition type is enabled for a ComponentTransition object.
        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the specified transition type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the specified transition type is added; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • setTransitionTypeDuration

        public void setTransitionTypeDuration​(int type,
                                      int duration)
        Sets the duration for the animation of a specified transition type.
        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the specified transition type, which can be SELF_SHOW, OTHERS_SHOW, OTHERS_GONE, SELF_GONE, or CHANGING.
        duration - Indicates the duration of the transition animation, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        4

      • setAnimatorProperty

        public void setAnimatorProperty​(int type,
                                AnimatorProperty animator)
        Sets a customizable component property animator of the specified transition type.
        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the specified transition type, which can be SELF_SHOW, OTHERS_SHOW, OTHERS_GONE, SELF_GONE, or CHANGING.
        animator - Indicates the component property animator.
        Since:
        4

      • getAnimatorProperty

        public AnimatorProperty getAnimatorProperty​(int type)
        Obtains the component property animator of the specified transition type.
        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the specified transition type, which can be SELF_SHOW, OTHERS_SHOW, OTHERS_GONE, SELF_GONE, or CHANGING.
        Returns:
        Returns the AnimatorProperty object of the specified transition type; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        4
